title: Clicker-Based Formative Assessment Strategies for Advanced Nursing Reasoning Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Targeting office/administrative professionals, emphasizing workplace relevance, operating a real-time response system using personal smartphones in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners apply advanced reasoning skills (clinical judgment, critical thinking) with over 80% accuracy in clinical case analysis
Learners improve peer feedback acceptance and error-correction abilities by over 70% through clicker-based formative assessments
Learners utilize evidence-based approaches with over 90% engagement in decision-making for complex patient scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
